verse.name: c1
v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Samaadhaana santoshamu paripoornamugaa nindi Yunnadi shaanti daata Yesu prabhuvu yeluchunna Raajyamulo manalanu paalivaariga jesina Raaraajunake stotramulu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana paapamulanu kshamiyinchenugaa calvary siluva Rakhtamu dwaaraa thana parishuddata yandu manala paali Vaariniga jese mahirnaa poornuda maa deva Mansaara ninu paadedanu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Parishudda pattanamu yentho soundharyamu kaligi Yunnadi bhartha koraku sidda padina pendli Kumaarthegaa nundenugaa thana vadhuvugaa jesina Prabhuke stuti chellinchedamu niratham{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Devude manatho nivasinchunu kaapura mundunu Manatho nityamu devude manaku thodai yundi Nadupunu manala paramunaku manalanu preminchina Prabhune aaraadhinchi mrokkedamu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mana kannula prati baashapmulanu thudichi veyunu Mana prabhu Yesu maranamu dukkhamu vedana Yundadu parishudda nagaramulo maranamu lokamu Saataanun gelichina prabhune poojinthumu{/lang-eng}
